@graph.name: Super Easy Banana Sushi
@graph.description: This banana sushi is covered in chocolate and topped with pistachios, coconut flakes, chia and sesame seeds. The recipe is super easy. No rolling required!

@graph.headline: Super Easy Banana Sushi
@graph.keywords: banana,banana sushi,chia seeds,chocolate,coconut flakes,easy,easy banana sushi recipe,fruit sushi,pistachios,sesame seeds,sushi with banana,sweet sushi,vegan,vegan banana sushi

@graph.name: Banana Sushi
@graph.description: This vegan banana sushi with dark chocolate and pistachios makes such an easy and delicious snack! If you like bananas, you will LOVE this banana sushi!
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons peanut butter (I used unsweetened peanut butter)

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the bananas and coat them with the peanut butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel the bananas and coat them with the peanut butter.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the chocolate (either by using a microwave or place it into a heatproof bowl and put it over a pan of barely simmering water).
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the chocolate (either by using a microwave or place it into a heatproof bowl and put it over a pan of barely simmering water).

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the bananas with the melted chocolate and sprinkle them with the above named toppings.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the bananas with the melted chocolate and sprinkle them with the above named toppings.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the chocolate harden for a couple of minutes, this will take about 5-10 minutes depending on how warm it is in your kitchen. On hot summer days, put them in the freezer for a few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the chocolate harden for a couple of minutes, this will take about 5-10 minutes depending on how warm it is in your kitchen. On hot summer days, put them in the freezer for a few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut them into bite-sized sushi pieces with a sharp knife. You can either eat the banana sushi right away or freeze it for an hour and two and enjoy it as easy vegan ice cream bites.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut them into bite-sized sushi pieces with a sharp knife. You can either eat the banana sushi right away or freeze it for an hour and two and enjoy it as easy vegan ice cream bites.
